entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rocky Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 3:30 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -12.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -16.6°C
Wind: WSW 38 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 7 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 5 cm except locally 15 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 early this evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
